english.segment1: We've been on the outside looking in before. We've lived on the inside with a closed locked door. We've slept in the corners of the open floor
english.segment2: We go round and round and round and round and round and round and round
english.segment3: [Chorus:]. There's no strength in a unicorn. No luck in a 4 Leaf Clover. There's no life unless it's born. And no death when it's over
english.segment4: We've listened with open ears yet closed our minds. We've loved without any tears from our own eyes. We've gone to the parties in our cheap disguise
english.segment5: We go round and round and round and round and round and round and round
english.segment7: There's no strength in a unicorn. No luck in a 4 Leaf Clover. There's no life unless it's born. And no death when it's over
